project.title: User Panel - MVP
project.description: Simple user management panel for basic CRUD operations on users and roles with authentication and role-based access control

phases.title: Foundation & Project Setup
phases.description: Initial project setup including database design, Express.js server configuration, and Next.js frontend initialization. Establish the technical foundation with proper folder structure and development environment configuration.

phases.title: Authentication System Implementation
phases.description: Build the core authentication system with JWT tokens, bcrypt password hashing, user registration/login APIs, and authentication middleware. This phase provides the security foundation for all protected features.

phases.title: User Management Backend
phases.description: Develop the backend APIs for user CRUD operations, profile management, and user status control. Create secure endpoints for user creation, reading, updating, and deactivation with proper validation.

phases.title: Role System & Access Control
phases.description: Implement the role-based access control system including role management APIs, user-role assignment functionality, and permission checking middleware. Create the foundation for secure access control across the application.

phases.title: Frontend Development & Integration
phases.description: Build the complete Next.js frontend with Tailwind CSS styling, implement all user interfaces for authentication, user management, and role administration. Integrate frontend with backend APIs and develop the dashboard interface.
